name: i3
description: The Laptop A features a sleek design with a 14-inch Full HD display, an Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, and a 256GB SSD. Ideal for both productivity and casual use, it offers fast performance and long battery life.

name: i5 11 gen
description: With a vibrant 15.6-inch 4K screen, Laptop B is perfect for media enthusiasts. Powered by an AMD Ryzen 7 CPU, 16GB RAM, and a 512GB SSD, it delivers exceptional speed and graphics for gaming and creative work

name: i7 13 gen
description: Laptop C is a lightweight, ultraportable device with a 13-inch Retina display, an Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and a 1TB SSD. It combines performance with portability, making it a great choice for on-the-go professionals.

name: i5 12 gen
description: Designed for gamers, Laptop D boasts a 17.3-inch Full HD display, an Intel Core i9 processor, 32GB RAM, and a 1TB SSD. Its dedicated NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics ensure smooth gameplay and immersive visuals.

name: i7 13 gen
description: Laptop E offers a versatile experience with a 2-in-1 12.5-inch touchscreen, an Intel Core M processor, 4GB RAM, and a 128GB SSD. Perfect for those who need both a laptop and a tablet in one compact device.
